description:
“Do you think the neighbors ever wonder what's going on over here?” Erik asked, looking nervously behind him.
“I doubt it, we’re pretty far away!”
“If I was over there I would have my own set of binoculars!”
Erik was all smiles as he stood at the edge of the pool telling us all about his personal life and adventures.

“I have some bisexual tendencies,” he said, looking downward just enough to avoid eye contact.
“Ah, so that’s why you’d be watching.”
“Of course! I’m not gonna miss the chance to spy on some good looking guys!”
“So when you do get a guy, what do you like?”
“I like to let go and give him control!” he said. “I like the idea of being dominated. For him to maybe even tie my hands up and do whatever he wants to me! Just take it!”
That really had my attention. There is something so interesting about a seemingly innocent guy having a dirty side!
“One time I was at a gym,” he continued. “I spied a hot guy and we kinda flirted. Next thing I know I was on my knees giving him head in the shower!”
“Do you still talk to this guy? Or was it like a fling?”
“Nope. Afterwards we kinda smiled and it was over. He was so fucking hot!”
A little bit of horse play ended with him in the pool... shorts, belt and all! He didn’t seem to mind, though, as he splashed around in the water. I think he was just happy to cool off from the heat. He was a little flirty when he climbed out...
“Looks like I missed my chance into tricking you into giving me some CPR,” he said, all wet.
He’s definitely an adorable guy, with a charming accent and a little bit of man fur!
title: Erik
